 2. Does there appear to be a straight line relationship? `Yes`
 3. Load the library s20x and make a lowess smoother scatter plot using trendscatter() (try a few values of f, f=0.5,0.6,0.7) record all three plots, use layout().

## Me

```{r}
obj = lm(Height~BHDiameter, data = spruce.df)
summary(obj)
plot(Height~BHDiameter, data = spruce.df)
abline(obj)
library(s20x)
trendscatter(Height~BHDiameter,f=0.7, data=spruce.df)
```
